content: Bord of Governors of the Federal Reserve System   6  September 26, 2017                                 Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System                         6  Figure 6 Some Labor Indicators Are Not Back to Pre-recession Levels  73  74  75  76  77  78  79  80  81  82  83  2.0   2.5   3.0   3.5   4.0   4.5   5.0   5.5   6.0   6.5   7.0  PercentPercent  Employment-to- population ratio, ages 25 to 54 (left axis)  Part-time employment for economic reasons (right axis)  Note: Part-time employment reported as a share of overall employment. Shaded areas mark recession periods. Source: Bureau of Labor Statistics.  1991 1993 1995 1997 1999 2001 2003 2005 2007 2009 2011 2013 2015 2017
